BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 050050 ZMM pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Zoning resolution amendment application no. N 050051 ZRM, pursuant to Sections 197-d and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment to Sections 96-40 and 96-80 concerning open space requirements in the Special Clinton District.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 050052 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under Section 74-681(a) of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to facilitate a general large-scale development. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 050053 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under Sections 74-743(a)(1), 74-743(a)(2), 96-40 and 74-743 the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to modify the maximum building height requirements to facilitate a general large-scale development. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
